product_name: Stonewear Designs Meridian Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Relaxed, wide-cut legs and a broad flat waistband-delicately gathered in the front-make the women's Stonewear Designs Meridian Capri Pants gloriously comfy for morning asanas. Recycled polyester with spandex for extra stretch. Gathers at front waistband add comfort and flattering style. Back vent slits at leg openings are lined with satin. Closeout.
short_description: Relaxed, wide-cut legs and a broad flat waistband-delicately gathered in the front-make the women's Stonewear Designs Meridian Capri Pants gloriously comfy for morning asanas.
